title.rendered: Eldorado Stone All Fired Up on the Cover of Residential Building Products and Technology

content.rendered:
So HOT it made the cover! Residential Building Products and Technology opens its May 2013 issue with its cover page fiercely dedicated to Eldorado Stone’s Artisan Fire Bowl.

Take a look at the digital magazine on resbuildmag.com that showcases an interactive fire!
